headline: Is ON Semiconductor Corporation (ON) The Best EV Stock to Buy Under $50?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best EV Stocks to Buy Under $50. headline: ON Semiconductor: A Buy With Caution Advised
summary: ON Semiconductor stock has already absorbed the risks of further declines in automotive and industrial segment and an oversupply of Silicon Carbide.

headline: Is Now the Time to Buy the 3 Worst-Performing Stocks in the S&P 500 This Year?
summary: Heading into trading on Monday, the S&P 500 was down around 5% to start 2025.  The three worst-performing stocks on the broad index as of Monday were Deckers Outdoor (NYSE: DECK), Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA), and On Semiconductor (NASDAQ: ON).  The S&P 500 stock down the most after the first quarter of 2025 is Deckers Outdoor, a footwear company that is struggling mightily despite posting what seemed to be decent results in its most recent quarter.
